wbml.vi module¶

wbml.vi.elbo¶

Construct the ELBO.

Parameters:
  • lik (distribution) – Likelihood.
  • p (distribution) – Prior.
  • q (distribution) – Approximate posterior.
  • num_samples (int, optional) – Number of samples. Defaults to 1.
Returns:

ELBO.
Return type:

tensor
